channel.title: Holiday Hack Orientation :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: Lynn Schifano mission statement Welcome to the 2025 SANS Holiday Hack Challenge! We’re on a train heading… NOT to the North Pole, but instead to The Neighborhood. Your cybersecurity skills are needed there this year! I’m here to help orient you to this year’s exciting challenge. I’m the Chief of Staff at Counter Hack, making sure the right people are doing the right thing at the right place at the right time – Herding cats, in other words.
